## Remarks Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.CreateChainTrustValidator%2A> method instead of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A> property to specify the context or to set chain policy. Chain policy can be used to specify the Enhanced Key Usage (EKU) for which the chain should be validated, or specify revocation checking.
